attributes.action: Reopen all roads that have been blocked or made one way as causing major traffic
attributes.additional_details: Why because this is causing aggravation to local residents and people who actually need to drive for a job.
attributes.background: Reopen road’s that have been shut as its causing major traffic jam’s day and night, no such thing as “rush hour” anymore as there is constant traffic all day and night, ambulances cant even get to where they need as roads narrow and traffic is terrible.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
